abstract: Institutional investors typically own preferred stock in technology start-ups. Now more of them also own common stock, which may lead to unintended consequences.

headline.main: Common Stock Ownership Spreads Among Start-Up Investors
headline.print_headline: Investors Give Up Rights for Shares in Start-Ups

snippet: Institutional investors typically own preferred stock in technology start-ups. Now more of them also own common stock, which may lead to unintended consequences.
